sum-of-a-list_key2: Agar aapko sum karna ho list ke elements ka recursion use kar kar, toh aap kaise karoge?
sum-of-a-list_key4: Ek list ke elements ka sum dekhne ke liye, aap pehle element ko baaki bachi hui list ke sum se jod kar dekh sakte hai
sum-of-a-list_key8: Kya aap aise hi ek length naam ka function bana sakte hai?
